# PED::SET_PED_PRELOAD_VARIATION_DATA

## Summary
Sets a component variation to preload into memory, without applying it on the ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **PED_COMPONENT** componentID
* **INT** drawableID
* **INT** textureID

## Returns
* **INT**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
from extreme3.c4
PED::SET_PED_PRELOAD_VARIATION_DATA(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), 8, PED::GET_PED_DRAWABLE_VARIATION(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), 8), PED::GET_PED_TEXTURE_VARIATION(PLAYER::PLAYER_PED_ID(), 8));

p1 is probably componentId
